title: India NCAP – TROPOMI O3 Columnar Density Extracts for Designated Airsheds
text:
Updated: January , 2024

131 NCAP non-attainment cities are grouped into 104 airsheds. Of these airsheds, 73 contain only one city; 18 contain two cities, and nine contain three cities. Four airsheds – Delhi, Mumbai, Indore, and Chandigarh contain 10, 8, 5, and 5 cities respectively. An additional 33 cities, not on the NCAP list are also part of these airsheds.

In the table below, for each of the designated airsheds, satellite observations from TROPOMI S5P for Ozone (O3) as columnar density (molecules/m2) is extracted for every 15-days for the period of 2019 to 2023. All the data processing was conducted on the Google Earth Engine. All the scripts and instructions to replicate the extraction process are uploaded on github .

Unit in the CSV files is molecules/m2. IMAGE1 is time-series of all the data from 2019 to 2023 IMAGE2 is time-series of all the data from 2019 to 2023 as year-on-year (for comparison)

Download airshed size information and associated GIS files here .

Back to India NCAP data repository .
